name: Passion
summary:
Eminence是澳洲的有名演奏动画以及游戏的交响乐团，曾和很多知名的作曲家同台演出（起源人，光田康典)。这是2007年一场名为passion的演奏会的CD，涵盖了汪达与巨像，异度传说，时空之轮，时空之匙等。这场演奏会，起源人，光田作为嘉宾还有美女小提琴家 Hiroaki Yura.

Composed by Yasunori Mitsuda

   Is Kirite Burning Up?
   from Kirite

   Time's Scar, In the Beach of Dreams - Another World & Radical Dreamers
   from Chrono Cross

   Sailing to the World
   from The Seventh Seal

   Pain
   from Xenosaga

Composed by Kow Otani

   Free Bird
   from Haibane Renmei

   The Sunlit Earth
   from Shadow of the Colossus

Composed by Yuki Kajiura

   Sakura
   from Xenosaga II

   Mai
   from .hack//Liminality

Composed by Hitoshi Sakimoto

   Ferris Wheel
   from Colors of Life

This CD was sold primarily to paying attendees after Eminence's various Passion concerts at Melbourne and Sydney, Australia; Singapore; and Baltimore, Maryland, USA; though it can occasionally be found through other outlets.

Concertmaster/Violin: Hiroaki Yura
Violin: Ayako Ishikawa
Piano: Natalia Raspopova
Percussion: Joshua Hill
Guitar: Zane Banks
Guitar/Bass Guitar: Jy-Perry Banks

Producer/Arranger: Hitoshi Sakimoto
Producer/Arranger: Yasunori Mitsuda
Founder/Artistic Director: Hiroaki Yura
Arranger: Nicole Brady
Arranger: Jackson Harrison
Engineer: Tim Carr
Assistant Engineer: Chris Doherty
Operations Co-ordinator: Yuya Fukuwa
Production Manager: Demetri Potiris
Japanese Liason: Bing Lu
Mixing: Jack Ma
Photography: Kenneth Ho
Design and Illustration: Althea Aseoche

Sponsors (Australia): Kinokuniya Books, PCMarket.com.au, Madman Entertainment, Japan Airlines
Sponsors (Singapore): The Chamber Music Society, National Youth Council, Traders Hotel by Shangri-La, Gameaxis

Special Thanks to: Elaine Chia, Adrian Tan, Anthony Fok, Danny Ma, Aidina Aierken, Chris Chan, Casey Poon, Lucy Yeoman... And an extra special thanks to the whole Eminence crew for their continued efforts in supporting Eminence.
